Constructor Detail

Adam4055

public Adam4055(Rs485.Port port,
                BaudRate baudrate,
                int flags)
         throws java.io.IOException
Setup Adam4055. Set all GPO as low Definition for "flags" variable NOTE: Un-used bits are DONT-CAREs BIT[4] Stop bit size: 0=>1bit, 1=>2bits BIT[3~2] Parity check: 00=>None, 01=>Odd, 10/11=> Even BIT[1~0] Data size: 00=>8bits, 01=>7bits, 10=>6bits, 11=>5bits

Parameters:
port - select which RS485 port is used
baudrate - specify baudrate of the RS485 port
flags - configure serial port.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the connection can be setup

Set one GPO value of ADAM 4055

Parameters:
gpo - the GPO number to be controled
level - HIGH or LOW
